id.description:
The id for the option. **Must be globally unique**, it will be translated
to an `id` prop in the DOM.

isHighlighted.description: Whether or not this option is highlighted.

isSelected.description: Whether or not this option is selected.

isDisabled.description: Whether or not this option is disabled.

children.description: Content to display as the option label.

elements.name: signature

properties.description:
The id for the option. **Must be globally unique**, it will be translated
to an `id` prop in the DOM.
Whether or not this option is highlighted.
Whether or not this option is selected.
Whether or not this option is disabled.
Content to display as the option label.

renderBeforeLabel.description: Content to display before the option label, such as an icon.
